AERT holds an annual national convention in conjunction with
the Institute for Education by Radio and Television at Ohio State
University, Columbus, Ohio. In addition to the Instituted three
day conference, AERT presents a stimulating one dsy program of
its own,
AERT is one of the organizations which sponsors the Joint
Committee on Educational Television. In this way, AERT endorses
JCET activities which have to do with trends, statistics, develop¬
ments across the nation in the establishment of stations, sched¬
uling workshops, engineering and program developments, and so on
in the ETV field.
A. membership in AERT carries with it the privilege of voting
in elections, participating in committee work, and holding office
in the Association*
A membership in AERT offers the opportunity of joining with
other AERT members throughout the United States to advance the
cause of educational radio and television.
Because of your participation in the activities of the Metro¬
politan School Study Council and because the Council has displayed
an active interest in educational TV, we feel that you and th©
organization you represent might wish to participate in the
activities of AERT, also. I am enclosing a copy of our standard
membership blank,
I am sure that you would find that a membership in AERT
would provide you with both services and materials which would
be of great use in your work. We feel that expanded support of
AERT will be rewarded' in the future significance of the Assoc¬
iation in the field of educational radio and television.
If I can be of service to you by providing you with any
further information on the aims, plans, and activities of the
Association, won’t you please let me know?
John Adams Rourke
National Membership Chairman
